name: distancefromtrajectory
title: Distance from Trajectory
description: Returns the minimum distance from one or more input positions to one or more trajectories.

inputs.name: tpoints_col
inputs.title: Trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column containing the points for each trajectory

inputs.name: join_type
inputs.title: Join type
inputs.description: Defines how the trajectories and positions will be joined
inputs.helper: If 'Key Join' is selected, the component will join the trajectories and positions using a key column. If 'Cross Join' is selected, the component will join the trajectories and positions using all the rows in the trajectories and positions tables. Using 'Cross Join' could result in a large number of rows in the output table.

inputs.name: traj_key_col
inputs.title: Join Key (Trajectories)
inputs.description: Column from the Trajectories table to be used as key when joining with the positions

inputs.name: position_key_col
inputs.title: Join Key (Positions)
inputs.description: Column from the Positions table to be used as key when joining with the trajectories

inputs.name: position_col
inputs.title: Position geometries column
inputs.description: Column containing the geometries of the positions

inputs.name: return_position_properties
inputs.title: Return position properties
inputs.description: If enabled, the component will also return all the columns from the positions table

inputs.name: distance_from
inputs.title: Distance from
inputs.description: Defines the point in the trajectory from which the distance will be computed
inputs.helper: If 'Nearest Point' is selected, the component will compute the distance from the nearest point in the trajectory to the position. If 'First Point' is selected, the component will compute the distance from the first point in the trajectory to the position. If 'Last Point' is selected, the component will compute the distance from the last point in the trajectory to the position.

inputs.name: distance_output_col
inputs.title: Distance column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the output column containing the distances

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the computed distances
